entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 15 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the morning then cloudy. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 15 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
